name: Ricochet Boy
description:
Bang-bang and no more nightmares. A fun game about a little boy shooting at scary nocturnal creatures.

The game is about logic. You need to calculate the trajectory of the bullet, taking ricochets into account, to efficiently hit targets.
You are low on ammo – every shot counts! Kill several enemies with a single shot. Head shots will give you additional points.
Get rewards for good results!
You can also publish your achievements and compete with other players in accuracy!
A new suit, new weapons, new abilities…
60 levels full of shooting and puzzles.
